title: Twinklez Splat Dualies
paragraphs: The Twinklez Splat Dualies is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is an Emberz-branded version of the Splat Dualies.

The Twinklez Splat Dualies is similar to the Splat Dualies but with a new color scheme. The sections that were black are now a hot pink and the sections that were green are now a pale gray. The ink tanks are now silver with an Emberz badge on the side.
The Twinklez Splat Dualies come with Fizzy Bomb and Big Bubbler. It was added as part of the Splatlands Collection on 12 June 2025.
- Promotional artwork for Land vs. Sea vs. Air
